Posts.Content: Hi Cat Do you know how spray is safer than roll on? I've always believed it was the other way round. It would be useful to know because if thats the case I'll be switching. I use mitchum at the minute. Not sure if safe but if tested I reckon you could go for days with one application!!!
Posts.Title: sweating-arm pit.

Posts.Content: Hi Kate Where can you buy bionsen from? I'd really like to get some. Thanks Michelle
Posts.Title: sweating-arm pit.

Posts.Content: Hey Cat, I used to think that sprays were worse than roll on because of the metal cannister and I read somewhere that research into breast cancer found that a number of women with breast cancer were found to have aluminium particals in their breast. However I read the back of a couple of roll ons and these contain metal also. Forgive me if the above does turn out to be wrong. When you speak with the oncologist please could you let me know? Thanks Michele
